prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s in a quiet office copy room, framed waist-up to
mid-thigh.
Pose: reaching up to a shelf with one arm, torso twisted slightly, hips angled forward, spine
subtly arched; the other hand resting on the printer edge (tension line).
Expression: intense sideways glance back to camera, half-lidded eyes, lips softly parted, no
smile.
Outfit: fitted cotton jersey turtleneck + high-waist skirt, matte texture with natural stretch lines.
Lighting: cool fluorescent overhead + softer warm spill from hallway (mixed light), smooth
highlight roll-off.
Camera: 50mm, f/1.8, handheld candid documentary snapshot. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
Exclude any readable text/logos/watermarks; printer labels/brands not readable; no HDR, no
hyper-clarity.
